tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He instantly understood the patient problem and arranged Hospital admission without wasting unnecessary time. He advised minimal tests.His junior doctors are also very very friendly. !We were also discharged from hospital well on time. We comfortably celebrated Diwali at home.Some improvements however needs in the Hospital nurse station section. They lack motivation and dedication.Nevertheless thanks a lot to his entire Team... May God bless him.!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ***** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****** ****** ** *********** he is a doctor who is calm friendly and has a lot of patience... he is one of the doctors who is practicing for the the patience.. He did give it his 100% for normal delivery.. if it would be any other doctor would do a c section.. but dr nitin gave his time full dedication and support and did a normal delivery for me for which i will never forget him life time... i will recommend each one n everyone to visit this doc.. who really values the patience...the staff supporting dr nitin aswell are friendly and are calm which helps to communicate with the patience well thank u doctor for all ur calmness and support u had for me..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Great doctor. Nice team. Friendly. Very practical. Friendly. The best part is he prescribes very less medicines.

review: Very patiently he explained n listened to my issues. He is very soft and very good. Doesnt haste at all. Clarifies all the issues and worries. I left with no worries at all.
